Description: Jar. Foliate panels and squashed stars. Made of lustre glazed and moulded ceramic, pottery.
Bibliographic references: Godman 1901 / The Godman collection of Oriental and Spanish pottery and glass, 1865-1900 (482)
Lane 1947 / Early Islamic Pottery: Mesopotamia, Egypt and Persia (fig.52.A)
